title: 58.1 (LOA)
content:
Nowhere is the passage of the reclaimers more evident than here. Every one of them passed through this threshold on their way down into the arcology ruin, and the signs of their passage are still evident today. The parts of the carbon-forged exterior not dissolved by the corrosive saliva of the reclaimer grubs are covered in crisscrossing claw marks of the seekers. Other, far more important areas of Spire have been the focus of attention during the reconstruction. However, this area is filled with people going about another purpose.

If you’re on THE DESCENT, go to 58.2. Otherwise, go to 58.3.
